name: 1990's Proto-Folklore
description:
Created for the Mörk Borg FÖLK-LORE Jam

A handful of classes and items that are, if not yet proper folk lore, on the verge of reaching full folkloredom, pulled from the deep well that is 1990's culture. 

Rather than being a list of what was cool then, I wanted to find  items and characters that still resonate now, 30 years later. Things that have entered pop culture; concepts that have been referenced and spoofed in a variety of medium. If you can think of anything I should have included, please let me know.
1990s Proto-Folklore is an independent production by Ahimsa Kerp and is not

affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.

MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
